Created attachment 35655
documentation for systemd

The documentation describes different ways to install tomcat on your servers, now that many linux systems use systemd to manage it's daemons it would be useful to have documentation that describes how to use tomcat together with systemd.

I have also included an example configuration file for systemd, as I'm far from a systemd expert i'm sure this can be further improved.

Patch is against trunk.
